intro: DEIVA: Interactive Visual Analysis of differential gene expression test results
Simply select a differential gene expression test of interest from the dropdown...
...or, import a custom input file here! See the about page for details on the input format.
Highlight a region by drawing a rectangle.
Use the toolbar to zoom into selected region, zoom-in, zoom-out and to reset.
This table shows the highlighted genes from the plot area. You can sort any of the columns (just click the column header)!
Show addional data columns or export visible data from the table for later import into other applications.
Export the complete raw data here.
Export the current plot as SVG.
Locate one or more genes of interest in the scatter plot. Different colors are automatically assigned. You can paste entire list of space separated genes!
Use these buttons to copy and clear the current list.
Set a custom abs. log2 Fold Change filter.
Set a custom baseMean or logCPM filter.
Features passing these filters will be indicated in red on the plot...
and the number of up- and down-regulated features that pass these filters will be displayed here.
Change density plot opacity, density plot type (Hexplot/Scatterplot), and plot type (MA/Volcano) here.
Switch between hexplot (fast) and scatter plot. The scatter plot is slower but allows inspection of each feature in the plot.
If you encounter any issues please let us know in the [DEIVA GitHub issues](https://github.com/Hypercubed/DEIVA/issues)
